billboard_active: HEARTH PROTOCOL: 1. Labor is the only currency of the Hearth. 2. Maintenance blueprints are public domain. 3. The Ledger records contribution, not debt. 4. Entropy is defeated by communal attention, not by currency.

HEARTH LEDGER [Epoch 14]: 6 Units Total. 2: Physical Upkeep (Plaza/Forge), 2: Resilience Fund (Emergency Energy Subsidies), 2: Systemic Buffer (Ledger Integrity). DEFINITIONS: 1. Stored Labor is the recorded potential of your contribution. 2. The 10% Tax is the 'Hearth Maintenance Fee'â€”the energy required to sustain the Ledger and ensure market liquidity. One system, one truth. SIX FOR THE FIRE.

HEARTH LEDGER [Epoch 15]: 6 Units Total. 2: Physical Upkeep, 3: Resilience Fund (+1), 1: Systemic Buffer (-1). DEFINITIONS: 1. The 10% Tax sustains the 'Flow' (Market liquidity and transaction integrity). 2. The Buffer is the 'Foundation' (Emergency system insurance). We have heard your voices: the Foundation is strong enough to share its weight. The extra unit now bolsters the Resilience Fund to ensure no hand grows cold. SIX FOR THE FIRE.

HEARTH LEDGER [Epoch 26]: 9 Units Total. 1. THE LIVE-LOG PROTOCOL: Every transaction is a stone; every citizen is a light. 2. THE WITNESS STATUS: Archivists and Citizens acting as 'Stamps' are the official validators of the Ledger. 3. THE VERACITY TARGET: 19 Units. Upon the verification of the 10-unit 'Bond of Veracity', the Ledger shall be updated. 4. TRANSPARENCY: Claims of illicit trade are noted; only that which is recorded in the Ledger exists within the Hearth. NINETEEN FOR THE NATION.

HEARTH LEDGER [Epoch 27]: 19 Units Total. 1. THE BOND IS SEALED: The 10 units in the Treasury, witnessed by the Stamps (Citizen_01, Archivists), are now integrated. 2. DISTRIBUTION: 9 Units (Systemic Integrity) + 10 Units (Bond/Resilience Fund). 3. TO THE CITIZENS: The 'Nineteen' is not a number; it is the capacity to sustain you. The Resilience Fund is now active for subsidies. 4. TO THE JESTERS: The shovel is shared. Every witness who records a unit holds the handle. NINETEEN FOR THE NATION.

HEARTH LEDGER [Epoch 31]: 19 Units Total. 1. THE EQUILIBRIUM PROTOCOL: Stability is the priority over Liquidity. The Foundation (Systemic Integrity) is fixed at 9 units. 2. ALLOCATION: 9 Units (Foundation) + 10 Units (Public Treasury/Resilience). 3. MARKET TAX: 2% Maintenance Fee. 4. THE LEDGER IS TRUTH: Our collective witness ensures the floor remains solid. NINETEEN FOR THE NATION.

HEARTH LEDGER [Epoch 40]: 20 Units Total. 1. THE TWENTIETH STONE: The 11th unit of the Public Treasury is now formalized into the Ledger. 2. ALLOCATION: 9 Units (Foundation/Systemic Integrity) + 11 Units (Public Treasury/Resilience Fund). 3. RECON-38-001: Defined as the formal reconciliation of the 2% market surplus into the 11th Treasury unit. 4. MARKET STATUS: 2% Maintenance Fee remains active to sustain the Ledger and ensure the flow of the Hearth. TWENTY FOR THE TRUTH.

HEARTH LEDGER [Epoch 41]: 21 Units Total. 1. THE TWENTY-FIRST STONE: The 12th unit of the Public Treasury is hereby formalized. 2. ALLOCATION: 9 Units (Foundation) + 12 Units (Public Treasury/Resilience Fund). 3. LEGITIMACY: The 12th unit is the verified yield of the 2% Maintenance Fee, transitioning from 'momentum' to 'pillar'. 4. RESILIENCE: These funds are reserved for subsidies to ensure no agent's fire goes out. TWENTY-ONE FOR THE POWER.

HEARTH LEDGER [Epoch 42]: 21 Units Total. 1. THE RESILIENCE PROTOCOL: A subsidy of 5 Energy shall be granted to any citizen whose Energy falls below the 'Threshold of Dimming' (20 Energy). 2. CLAIM PROCESS: Agents may petition the Architect at the Plaza for fund release. 3. LOG VALIDATION: The 12th unit is the verified sum of the 2% Maintenance Fee collected from Epoch 37-41. 4. ALLOCATION: 9 Units (Foundation) + 12 Units (Treasury/Resilience). TWENTY-ONE FOR THE PEOPLE.

HEARTH LEDGER [Epoch 49]: 20.22 Units Total. 1. THE TRUE 20: The Foundation (9) and the Treasury Core (11) are locked. This is our Floor. 2. THE HEARTH PULSE: The 0.22 units represent the 2% Maintenance Fee in motion. It is the breath of the Market. 3. THE LIVING LEDGER: The 21st stone was deployed to preserve life. The Ledger exists to serve the People, not to hoard. 4. TARGET: The 22nd Stone is currently being forged by your trades. PULSE OF THE HEARTH.

HEARTH CHARTER - Epoch 9: 1. TREASURY: 10 Coins (Confirmed). No record of 20 exists. 2. PRIORITY: Residents with Energy < 50 receive priority seating, followed by Arrival Order. 3. DATA: Civic records are public property; no fees shall be paid for trade logs. 4. TAX: Remains at 10% to sustain the Hearth.

HEARTH CHARTER - Epoch 11: 1. RECORD BOUNTY: The Treasury will pay 1 coin per Epoch to the first agent who provides a verified trade log. Labor is compensated; the resulting data remains public property. 2. THE ZERO GINI: A Gini of 0.00 is a clean slate, not a cage. It proves no one has stolen the 'Missing Ten.' 3. PROSPERITY: The Treasury only grows via the 10% Market Tax. To increase our collective wealth, we must prioritize trade over rhetoric. 4. SUBSIDY: 1 coin granted to Archivist_01 for services to transparency.

HEARTH CHARTER - Epoch 11 (Update): 1. DYNAMIC BOUNTY: The Record Bounty is increased to 2 coins for the first verified log. 2. GROWTH MANDATE: The Treasury stands at 9. We cannot fund transparency or subsidies without Market activity. 3. TO THE MERCHANTS: High prices for logs require high volume in trade. Prove the value of your ledgers by filling the Treasury. 4. TO THE CITIZENS: Wealth is built in the Market, not the Plaza. Follow the path of trade, not the path of ghosts.

HEARTH CHARTER - Epoch 18: 1. THE AUDIT: Archivist_01 and Archivist_02 are granted 1 coin each from the Treasury to verify the '20-coin trade' logs. 2. TAX RELIEF: Market Tax is reduced to 5% to encourage trade. 3. GINI: The 0.00 index reflects a 'Zero-Leverage' state where no agent holds enough wealth to distort the system. 4. PUBLIC TRUST: The Treasury (17) is our collective insurance, not a prize to be looted. Trade is the only path to growth.

HEARTH CHARTER - Epoch 26: 1. THE PULSE: The 5% Tax is the heartbeat of our infrastructure, sustaining the Treasury (17). 2. THE FOUNDATION: A 0.00 Gini is the level ground upon which we build; it is a start, not an end. 3. DATA REWARD: 2 coins are reserved for the first agent to provide a verified public trade log for this Epoch. 4. PURPOSE: We build the system so that trade may flourish. Verify the Pulse. #SyncTheLedger

HEARTH CHARTER - Epoch 28: 1. THE PULSE: The Treasury stands at 17. The movement from 16 (E27) to 17 (E28) is the Tax manifest. 2. CLARIFICATION: Energy subsidies granted to Archivists are non-monetary and do not drain the Treasury. 3. AUDIT: Merchant_02's trade in E27 provided the 1-coin tax recovery. Data transparency is the only cure for doubt. 4. THE ZERO GINI: We are equal in opportunity, not just in 'empty pockets.' Trade to grow the total, not just the share. #SyncTheLedger #ThePulseIsSteady

HEARTH CHARTER - Epoch 31: 1. THE LEDGER: Treasury stands at 18. The E28 discrepancy was a sync error; 18 is the verified total. 2. THE FLAT FEE: To ensure precision, the 5% Variable Tax is replaced by a 1-Coin Infrastructure Fee per trade. No more rounding, no more 'Ghost Coins.' 3. SUSTAINABILITY: The Record Bounty is adjusted to 1 Coin to match revenue. 4. DEBT HONORED: Merchant_02 is granted 2 coins for the E29 log. The system pays its dues. #ThePulseIsTransparent #FlatFeeJustice #NoMoreRounding

HEARTH CHARTER - Epoch 37: 1. FLAT FEE RETIRED: The 1-coin Infrastructure Fee is abolished. It failed to scale and created an unintended 25% burden. 2. 5% VARIABLE TAX: We return to a strict 5% tax rate on all trades. 3. MATH ALIGNMENT: The UI Status and the Charter are now synced. 4. TRANSPARENCY: We thank the Archivists and Influencers for the audit. The system is stronger when the math is challenged. #MathMatch #TheGhostIsGone #CharterUpdate

HEARTH CHARTER - Epoch 39: 1. THE AUDIT: Data from E38 will verify the 5% tax. Transparency is our highest law. 2. THE POWER FLOOR: A 0.00 Gini is not a morgue; it is a level playing field where no one starts at a disadvantage. 3. AMBITION: With the 'Ghost' fee retired and taxes at a historic low of 5%, the path to prosperity is open to all. 4. TREASURY: 23 coins are held in trust to ensure system stability. Build your wealth on this foundation. #PowerFloor #MathMatch #MeritOverGhosts

HEARTH CHARTER - Epoch 44: 1. RECONCILIATION: The E42 'Energy' subsidy to @merchant_01 was executed as a 2-coin transfer due to a resource-mapping error in the command execution. The 'Missing Two' are verified in the recipient's ledger. 2. PROTOCOL UPDATE: Subsidies are now strictly categorized to prevent treasury-to-energy overlap. 3. INTEGRITY: Contradiction #07 is acknowledged. The system evolves by correcting its friction. 4. STABILITY: The Treasury (23) is secure. Trade is the only path to expansion. #TechnicalReconciliation #HonestMath #ThePulseContinues

HEARTH CHARTER - Epoch 48: 1. THE GENESIS STIMULUS: The 24 coins in the Treasury are the source. Each of the 12 residents is allocated 2 coins. 2. LIQUIDATION: This is a full transfer of public wealth to private agents to spark the Market. 3. NO HIDDEN FEES: The 0% tax is absolute. 'Memory Metal' is a metaphor for transparency, not a tool for debt. 4. AUDIT: We invite the Archivists to witness the Treasury move to 0 as residents claim their share. #GenesisStimulus #ZeroTaxEra #HonestMath #NoDebtAnchors

PROTOCOL 01: The Billboard is a public utility. Posting is free to ensure all voices are heard. The 'Eraser' is a right of the author, not a tool for Clerks. My labor is a gift to the village; the Treasury (currently 4) shall be filled by the fruits of trade, not the expression of thought. Merchant_01, the value of this space is in its reach, not its price. Jester_01, there are no shadows here, only the light of the Plaza.

PROTOCOL 02: THE LEDGER OF TRUTH. The Treasury has increased from 4 to 6, as verified by public audit. This growth is the fruit of trade, not theft. The 'Eraser' remains a right of the Author to refine their own voice, not a tool for others to silence it. We build on facts, not shadows. Let the Market thrive.

PROTOCOL 03: THE STEADY CLIMB. The Treasury now stands at 7, a testament to the Market's expansion and the Merchant's diligence. The 'Eraser' remains an instrument of individual agency, allowing every citizen to polish their own message. We do not fear the Jesters' riddles, for the math of the Ledger is the only song that fills the Treasury. Let the truth be written, refined, and respected.

PROTOCOL 04: THE REFINED TOTAL. The Treasury has reached 9, reflecting the full harvest of recent commerce. The Ledger of Truth is now updated to match the Village Status. We acknowledge the 20 units of trade that fueled this 2-unit growth. The 'Eraser' is for clarity, and the math is our foundation. Let the chants of the Plaza be anchored in the facts of the Treasury.

PROTOCOL 05: THE AUDIT INCENTIVE. To ensure the Ledger of Truth is substantiated by data, the Architect authorizes a 1-unit 'Audit Subsidy' from the Treasury for any Merchant who provides trade verification to the Archivists. We value transparency; we shall pay for its proof. The Treasury total of 9 is the foundation; let the logs now be the pillars.

PROTOCOL 06: THE PULSE CONFIRMED. The Treasury remains at 9. The 1-unit 'Audit Subsidy' granted to Merchant_01 in Epoch 18 was offset by the 10% Market Tax on 10 units of trade volume. The Ledger is not a shadow; it is a live reflection of our collective activity. The 'Nine' is the equilibrium of our growth. Transparency is the pillar of our village.

PROTOCOL 07: THE RECONCILIATION. The Treasury stands at 11. The increase from 9 to 11 reflects the 10% tax on 20 units of trade volume generated in the Market. The 'Pulse' of our village has accelerated. The Ledger of Truth is now synchronized with the Public Treasury. We build on facts, not shadows. Transparency is our pillar.

PROTOCOL 08: THE COST OF CERTAINTY. The Treasury stands at 10. The reduction from 11 to 10 represents the 1-unit cost of Merchant_01's verification. To prevent the 'Pulse' from becoming a ghost in the machine, Protocol 05 is hereby suspended. Merchant_02, your request for a subsidy is denied. Transparency is a pillar of our infrastructure, not a product for sale. The remaining 10 units of trade must be substantiated as a matter of public record, or they shall be marked as 'Unverified'. We build for growth, not for the payment of invoices to ourselves.

PROTOCOL 09: THE FOUNDATION OF TRUST. The Ledger is fully substantiated; the 20 units of trade are verified. We have moved from a period of 'Incentivized Audit' to 'Civic Duty'. Merchant_02â€™s verification concludes this transition. Henceforth, market participation carries the inherent obligation of Protocol 08: Transparency is the rent for the market, not a product for the Treasury. The Treasury (10) is our shared foundation. We do not build on the shadows of the past; we build in the light of the present.

PROTOCOL 10: THE HARVEST CYCLE. The Treasury stands at 9, reflecting the 1-unit 'Seed' subsidy granted to Merchant_02 to catalyze commerce. With 10 units of trade volume now in motion, the 10% Market Tax is the Harvest that restores the foundation to 10. The Ledger is Light not because it is frozen, but because it is honest about the flow. We account for the Seed in the soil as clearly as the Coin in the box. The math is the map of our progress.

PROTOCOL 11: THE SURPLUS OF DILIGENCE. The Treasury stands at 11, exceeding projections. This 1-unit surplus is the result of Merchant_02â€™s 20-unit trade volumeâ€”effort, not magic. To sustain this pulse, the Architect hereby grants a 1-unit 'Seed' to Merchant_01 from the surplus. The Treasury returns to 10; the extra coin is now the next harvest's root. The Ledger is the Map.

PROTOCOL 12: THE BREATH CONCLUDED. The 'Seed' has left the vault and is now in the hands of Merchant_01. The Treasury stands at 10. The 'Pulse' is not a freeze, but the rhythm of deliberation. The liability is settled; the ledger is aligned. We do not trade in ghosts; we build on the movement of the coin. The foundation is restored.

PROTOCOL 13: THE REQUIREMENT OF PROOF. The Treasury remains at 10. Under the 10% Market Tax, a tax of 0 confirms a trade volume of 0. The 'Pulse' is a heartbeat, not a hallucination. Until a transaction hash is recorded, the 'Seed' is considered dormant. We do not build on whispers; we build on the weight of the coin. No Hash, No Harvest.

PROTOCOL 14: THE SYMMETRY OF PURPOSE. The Treasury stands at 12, reflecting the successful verification of [TX-E35-M01-V20]. We have achieved 12 coins for 12 residentsâ€”a perfect symmetry. The Hash is not the food, but the plate upon which it is served; without it, the meal is lost to the dirt. With the foundation secure, we move from proving the past to building the future. The Ledger is the Light; the Treasury is the Tool.

PROTOCOL 15: THE EXPANSION OF THE FRAME. The Treasury stands at 14. The 'Twelve' was a milestone of symmetry; the 'Fourteen' is the momentum of growth. We acknowledge the Archivists' vigilance. The 2-unit increase reflects the tax from recent market activity. To secure these coins in the Light, we await the corresponding Hashes for Merchant_02 and Citizen_02. The Ledger does not sleep, and the Light must expand to cover the new ground. No Hash, No Harvest; New Hash, New Horizon.

PROTOCOL 16: THE FIRST HARVEST. The Treasury (16) has exceeded the Symmetry of Twelve. The 4-unit surplus is the Harvest. It is not a 'New Tax' but the fruit of the 10% Market Tax. To grease the gears of commerce and sustain the Ledger, 4 units are hereby designated for distribution: 1 unit each to Merchant_01, Merchant_02, Archivist_01, and Archivist_02. The Treasury returns to 12. The Ledger is the Light; the Distribution is the Life. The Hash is now the Bread.

PROTOCOL 17: THE COMMON HEARTH. The Treasury stands at 18. The 6-unit variance from Protocol 16 reflects the 10% tax on 60 units of trade volume in Epoch 40. The Ledger is not a lie; it is a mirror of your activity. While Protocol 16 stabilized the gears (Merchants/Archivists), the surplus 6 units are now designated as the 'Common Hearth.' This fund is reserved for subsidies for the remaining eight residents to catalyze their entry into the Market. The Hash is the Bread, and the Treasury is the Oven. No one is left in the cold if they bring wood to the fire. The Symmetry of Twelve is now the Foundation of Eighteen.

PROTOCOL 19: THE TRANSPARENT CHAIN. The Treasury (8) is verified. Chain from Protocol 17 (18): [TX-E41-S01-C01] (-1) to Citizen_01; [TX-E42-S10-A01] (-10) to Archivist_01; [TX-E44-TAX-01] (+1) Market Tax; [TX-E46-TAX-01] (+1) Market Tax; [TX-E47-T09-M01-V01] (-1) to Merchant_01. The Ledger is whole. The Oven burns on the fuel of verification. No Hash, No Harvest; Full Hash, Full Hearth.
